title: Honey的艺术作品页面
content:
大家好。
地球冒险类（？）SCP 像素画及其他东西。
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/meltingIceberg/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=我该加个说明吧？]]

[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*你遇到了一个融恰的Iceberg，
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/Sadman/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=当你犯了愚蠢的错误且你的大脑永远不会忘记这回事时，你不恨吗？是的，我也恨。]]

[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*你遇到了一个想死的男人。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]


[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/Banana/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=苹果子之叔]]

[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*你遇到了一个香蕉人。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/Dino/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=Beeg咆哮]]

[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*Whitney受够了你的坏把戏。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/Beep/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=哔哔布尔型]]

[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*尝试&合伙攻击
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/Teach/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=二二得四]]
[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*你遇到了一位迟到的教师，尽早解决战斗为上。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/House/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=注意保护好你的膝盖！]]
[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*圆房子试图偷走你的膝盖。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/Cleffy/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=新时代黑屁/巨魔迷因，地球冒险]]
[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*谱号和他的同伙想要干坏事。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/Squid/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=佩妮!]]
[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*佩妮拍了下水
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/Box/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=别了，我会思念你们的！]]
[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*你停在一旁，并对他们道声再见。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/Prometheus/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=那些一定都是注释。 ]]
[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*你被遇到的普罗米修斯.Sic吓到了！（等下...那些眼睛只是生气时的眼眶和条状注释构成的么？
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/Lent/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=穿着卡骆驰的长发人]]
[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*哈利摩佐夫和其同伙摆出了神棍造型。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/507/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=哦不，他被扬举得到处都是]]
[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*Funky维度的人被扬举到了现实。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/Watch/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=为什么文件名是守夜人]]
[[div class="txt-out" style="background:#000;  "]]
[[div class="txt-in" style="border: 3px solid #fff;  "]]
##e8e8e8|*这个男人递来了根香烟。##
##e8e8e8|▶ 接受##
##e8e8e8|@@  @@不用，谢了##
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/Pennies/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=完美截流]]
[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*5595和其伙伴们闻起来很多。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/EthicsCore/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=我喜欢《半条命》和《传送门》]]
[[div class="txt-out" style="background:#fff;  "]]
[[div class="txt-in" style="border: 3px solid #000;  "]]
*你的行为在联邦里是不当的
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/BoredBoi/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=大情绪]]
[[div class="txt-out"]]
[[div class="txt-in"]]
*无聊透的艺术家希望遭遇一场战斗
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/honeychips4090/Why/medium.jpg|align=right/left/center|width=Xpx|caption=为什么？]]




[[include :etinjat:typeface-cn
|VonwaonBitmap-12px=true
]]
[[module css]]

.txt-out{
    border-radius: 0.2rem 0.2rem 0.2rem 0.2rem;
  
   background:  #76feb4;   
   width:20rem;   
  padding:0.1rem;
  margin:0.5rem;
  clear:both;
}

.txt-in{
   min-height:6rem;
   min-width: 5rem;
    border-radius: 0.2rem 0.2rem 0.2rem 0.2rem;
    border: 3px solid  #001300 ; 
  padding:0 0.5rem 0 0.5rem;
  margin: 0.1rem !important;
  font-family: 'VonwaonBitmap 12px',  '黑体';
  font-size: 150%;
}

[[/module]]
author: Etinjat
